website_summaries.verdict: Rustic slate board with accessory knifes that makes for a well-rounded cheeseboard set. Classy, simple, and modern.
pros: Brushed silver handles that match knife set and no slip/no-scratch bumper feet
Easy to write on slate and comes with two stone chalks to designate cheese cuts
Lightweight and easy to pick up thanks to industrial brushed-silver handles
cons: Some reports of staining from certain cheese
Somewhat too big to be placed on small side tables

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but unusable
customer_reviews.text: I chose this board, as it was perfect for my style and needs. When it arrived, the holes that were predrilled did not match the length of the handles, so the handles could not be attached. The box had a customer service email printed right on the back, saying to direct any communication there. I emailed them. The email was returned as not a valid address. I am returning it to Amazon for a refund, as I don't have faith that having it replaced would result in a product without the same defect.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 in IC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product, looks expensive, but was super affordable!! The only downside is it’s tough to clean, some of the softer cheeses have stained the slate a little, even after I sealed it in olive oil. All in all though, I would purchase for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but rub some mineral oil on it first
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Looks really nice for entertaining. However, you should rub some food grade mineral oil into the slate surface to prevent staining from the cheese and charcuterie
customer_reviews.author: Barbalaboo

customer_reviews.title: The tray and coasters themselves are really great and seem sturdy and the cheese knife set is ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure how to access the E-Book considering nothing came inside of the packaging in regards to the E-Book. Also, chalk came broken in 4 pieces instead of 2. The tray and coasters themselves are really great and seem sturdy and the cheese knife set is great quality. My boyfriend's dad just bought a new sofa and all he does is lounge so I figured, "Why not enhance his sloth like experience with a tray meant for cheeses?" DUH.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift or for yourself
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Mother’s Day gift for my daughter in Florida. She sent me a picture of it and said she loves it. I’m thinking of purchasing one for myself. It’s the perfect size to have a variety of cheeses and she appreciates the cutlery comes with it for select cheeses to cut it. Also the chalk you can customize little notes on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking cheese board and knives, but slate is unfinished and takes on grease stains
customer_reviews.text: I like pretty much everything about this board and the cheese knives except the fact that it is made of raw slate rather than sealed slate. Meaning any food you put on this board that has fat in it, like meats and some cheeses, will stain. I have tried a few methods for lifting grease stains out of slate to no avail. I still use this board if I can hide the stains, but I have gone back to using my trusty marble serving boards for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Henry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking forward to hosting a wine and cheese tasting with my new slate board. The set comes with two coasters, four serving utensils and a beautiful slate board. The rough edges give the board a classy authentic look. It also comes with two pieces of chalk for easy labeling. The package arrived in tact and on time. Thank you for an excellent product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee M.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant piece
customer_reviews.text: Planning to use this as a charcuterie board. It’s a lot bigger than I expected which I do love. The slate has no imperfections and the handles are sturdy. Not too heavy too which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Cheese Board
customer_reviews.text: This Cheese Board is heavy and looks very durable. Before I bought this Cheese Board, I thought there's the brand label is "Cusine Wonders" is printed on the product. And I was wrong. It is nice and plain design and ready to use. And you can write on the board to label the different cheeses that you have.
customer_reviews.author: WY

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Product & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful cheese board! It came packaged in the most thoughtful, and careful way. The board is very sturdy, really great size and in perfect condition. Additionally, the customer service from this business is above and beyond. My package was a delayed a day due to the surge in shipping due to COVID-19. The owners reached out right away to apologize and offer assistance where possible. So nice, and unexpected! Will definitely be buying from this business again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase !
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Have used for two celebrations since it arrived. It was delivered in perfect condition.I love that you can personalize it with the chalk that is included ! All my guests loved it as well ! The quality is excellent and the serving utensils are nice quality. The price was excellent as I saw a similar product with the handles and no serving pieces or chalk for $10.00 more from another retailer. Thank you ! I am so happy I purchased this product and look forward to using it for years to come !😊
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Greene

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles and unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, size and feel of this board. Unfortunately mine is super unbalanced and very wobbly. I tried multiple surfaces, super wobbly. I reached out to the company twice for assistance.... no response. Unfortunately, I’ll be returning this. I cannot recommendation this product at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and company! It's fragile, and unfortunately my slate arrived broken. The company was a dream to work with and I received my replacement ahead of schedule. It's a good size and quality, and I love the look. You can personalize it for special occasions. I would definitely recommend for purchase! Wine glass not included ;)
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Cheese is easier to eat now.
customer_reviews.text: I used to have trouble eating cheese because I had to pick up a whole wheel & chew on it. Now I can cut cheese into bite sized pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Howard D. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: All around great experience and product. This seemed like the best value for product ratio. Great communication from the seller throughout the whole process. Was packaged safely and wasnt damaged at all in transit. The board itself is a great large size with very sturdy handles. The utensils and chalk are also high quality. I bought this for myself but will likely purchase again as a gift for other people.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Greygor

customer_reviews.title: Love it and you will too
customer_reviews.text: It was very good quality and I gave already used it at wine and cheese party at my home.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Graves

customer_reviews.title: Loads of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boss, and brought it to her party filled with cheese. Everyone at the party complimented it, and she was so surprised the next day when she tried to give it back and I told her that it was for her! I would absolutely gift this again (and maybe buy one for myself!)
customer_reviews.author: CJ Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks great and got a lot of compliments from family. Everyone one wanted to know where to get one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Best product and well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slate cheese board as a gift to myself. I love it. It’s large enough to make a really beautiful cheese platter. What’s even better is their customer service. Sylvie goes above and beyond to make sure you are very happy with the product! I highly recommend purchasing this cheese board from this supplier...you will be as happy as I am!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Great Slate Cheeseboard!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for friends. They really liked it. Will use it for entertaining......
customer_reviews.author: Jag33

customer_reviews.title: Great looking slate cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Love the brushed stainless handles and the padded feet. Beautiful construction, would recommend. Great quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friends bridal shower and she loved it! It was easy for her to assemble and worked great! This cheese board looks expensive, so I am happy the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love to use this when we are having guests over! Easy to clean and chalk comes right off!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Received the board in great shape. Was able to put it together very easy. This would also be great wedding shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Teiken

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase:)
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly stocked when I opened this product. For the price, it’s great quality. I’ve recommended this to many people now. I love being able to write on it. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We received one and loved it so much we decided to buy one for our kids
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Gift Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and the recipient has been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect! And very heavy and sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a different purpose - I'd been looking for a tray for my kitchen island to keep my candles on but had trouble finding a color that matches my cabinets. This is perfect! And very heavy and sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and unusual
customer_reviews.text: This board makes a great presentation for cheese. I like that it has handles on it and that you write the types of cheese being presented on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Shopper!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and very nice Cheese board. Packaged very securely. Arrived in perfect condition! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: JD Florida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, especially for the price! You get so much for your money
customer_reviews.author: CollinG

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my party table! I absolutely love the slate cheese board and brushed silver knife set, they look sleek and stylish. The black slate is the perfect canvas for the colors of the cheese, fruit, and nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Mdm

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother and she loves it? It’s a good size for laying out all your options charcuterie and looks really nice also.
customer_reviews.author: Dani spooner

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and very useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese tray, had a party yesterday and received so many compliments. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The slate cheese board arrived safely and I am delighted with it. The cheese board was a nice quality and a great value for the price. My order arrived a day earlier than expected. Very satisfied and would highly recommend the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M. Hellmers

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an upcoming dinner party and unfortunately did not open the box until the night of the dinner party which of course was after the return day window had expired. So now I’m stuck with this broken cheese board that I cannot use and I cannot get refunded or have it replaced. Super lame
customer_reviews.author: MadameElle

customer_reviews.title: No holes to attach the handle
customer_reviews.text: Received my cheese slate today with NO holes for handle. How I’m going to use this?
customer_reviews.author: Garine Hovanessian

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product, much nicer than I thought it would be. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: joenne pope

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful slate cheese board
customer_reviews.text: I've assembled and oiled it. Looks great - it's the perfect size & not too heavy! Can't wait to use it this holiday season!
customer_reviews.author: scrabble player

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful tray, and the handles are awesome. Don't miss the chalk - it isn't your kids sidewalk chalk. It looks great adding a message or describing the cheeses. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We gave the board as a house warming gift. The board is heavy and sturdy and the silver utensils are solid and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Well made item for an incredible value. It arrived promptly and made a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap slate
customer_reviews.text: Used this once and the slate is spotty from the cheese on top of it. I expected the slate to be of higher quality. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Had a wine and cheese party, it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G.

customer_reviews.title: Excited about my new cheese board
customer_reviews.text: So excited to receive my new cheese board today after returning home from vacation. It is very sturdy and I was pleasantly surprised about the nice side handles (I don't think I paid attention to them before I ordered it.). The four utensils that come with it will be very useful. This is a must have if you like to serve cheese/crackers/fruit to guests. It would also be nice during a quiet dinner at home as welll!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam H

customer_reviews.title: Made an awesome wedding gift for my sister and the company took ...
customer_reviews.text: Made an awesome wedding gift for my sister and the company took extra care when shipping me my item so it arrived on time in one piece much appreciated!!! Thank you I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: chanel sierra-davidson

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, good quality, 2 minutes to assemble handles which were shipped separately to avoid breakage in transport.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L Adams

customer_reviews.title: Now it looks like it was covered in oil
customer_reviews.text: It stained from the cheese (mozzarella) after one use. Now it looks like it was covered in oil. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had potential to be great....
customer_reviews.text: ...but this came shattered in the mail. It's a shame since I think this would have been a great cutting board!
customer_reviews.author: GMan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts. I opened one, to check the quality. Pretty nice. The cheese knives are much better quality than I expected. Slate and handles are nice. The edges of the slate are a little sharp. Once I washed and oiled it, it looked really nice. May get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived damaged but seller made it right & the second one arrived in giftable condition. The person I bought it for loved it. Handles are a great feature & the large size is nice. Just check it before giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: J-d-s

customer_reviews.title: Elevate your cheese consumption with this gorgeous slate cheeseboard!
customer_reviews.text: This cheeseboard is stunning (we engraved ours -- so that's not included)! It arrived on time and in one beautiful piece. The polished handles were easy to attach and make the cheeseboard easy to move. It comes with a set of lovely cheese-eating utensils and makes for a beautiful table-top display. Elevate your cheese consumption with this gorgeous slate cheeseboard!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cheese board
customer_reviews.text: I needed a large cheese board and thought the slate would keep things cooler longer. I really like this boards size and ease of use. I did put a good coat of olive oil on before I ever used and have not had any staining and is so easy to clean with soap and water. The tools are a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this cheese board looks. The black slate matches with everything you decide to put out with it. Eventually, I will buy a bigger one. It makes for a lovely Charcuterie presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Skyfoxx23

customer_reviews.title: great gift for people
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for a friend. Sellers communication has been terrific! Hoping she loves the item as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: deejenna

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! I bought this as a gift and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I bought this as a gift and it's BEAUTIFUL. It looks great, the edging detail of the stone is beautiful, the cheese tools are sturdy and it was super easy to put together! Heavy duty and perfect for any occasion. Comes in a nice box too, so it's really easy to wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Natashia Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese slate with tools!
customer_reviews.text: This was the only handled cheese slate with tools! We keep the slate in the fridge. When we serve meat and cheese it’s nice to keep them cool and this has been perfect. The seller sent the product well packaged and the order was sent promptly. Will probably buy more as gifting season is approaching.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: THIS is what customer service is all about!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT customer service!! A beautiful piece that will make a wonderful gift for my neighbor. Classy, chi-chi, and a company that actually cares about the customer. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Caffeine Queen

customer_reviews.title: Get looking, large enough for multiple use serving tray.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself and another for daughter. We both like to set a nice arrangement when entertaining. Quite classy looking. Easy to clean. 5*
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Lacy Bird
customer_reviews.text: I purchased (2) Slate Cheese Boards for two of my adult children. When they opened the gifts, they were thrilled! The board and all included cutlery were lovely. I'm sure they will enjoy the set for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice slate cheese board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, but I will probably end up buying myself one too! Good size and practical. I cannot speak to the durability yet as I just gifted it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Palladino

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheese Board
customer_reviews.text: This was sent as a gift to my son. They enjoy entertaining and serving cheeses and different meats. This was a much appreciated addition to their serving pieces.
customer_reviews.author: janet norris

customer_reviews.title: Nice for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a gift. My mom loves it. It looks nice. the chalk does not come off well. But nice for entertaining
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Price & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these for friends housewarming parties. Nice quality did not look cheap at all! I would recommend this item for anyone looking for a nice Charcuterie board. The utensils are a nice added touch with this board.
customer_reviews.author: Goji

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Lived the quality, functionality and elegant look. Also loved the serving utensils.
customer_reviews.author: H.L.

customer_reviews.title: Say cheese
customer_reviews.text: Great for company or a party. Love the cheese utensil that came with it as well
customer_reviews.author: Melk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Serving Tray
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to look at, nice weight, looking forward to using during a dinner with friends
customer_reviews.author: Jerse

customer_reviews.title: Super cool and great cost! Impressive as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This makes for a great house warming gift! Elegant looking but cost-efficient! My friends loved it and as long as you take care of it, it will impress many guests for the future!
customer_reviews.author: Dani L

customer_reviews.title: Cheese Board
customer_reviews.text: We sent the Cheese Board as a gift and they are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: patricia ryan

customer_reviews.title: Shipped timely & intact - looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The slate cheese board arrived intact & is very high quality - it looks great & I can’t wait to use it for Thanksgiving!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Serve your cheese with style!
customer_reviews.text: The size and shape of this board leaves enough room to be creative and artistic! The serving pieces included are excellent quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McCarthy-Snow

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a very nice gift, so didn’t open. Heavy and seemed well made
customer_reviews.author: Karen Korean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great closing gifts for my clients. I can personalize each one
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Love the large size and how heavy duty it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the large size and how heavy duty it is -- lot of bang for your buck. Being able to label the cheese with the chalk is a cute touch for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Ordered for all my staff this year
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Ordered for all my staff this year. Arrived promptly and no broken pieces! Looks nice! The box/ packaging could be nicer
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice overall. A few slate pieces have chipped away from the edge, but nothing severe. Handles aren't to flimsy and accessories go well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This board is so chic. The silver handles are a nice touch, and the bottom has stoppers so it won't slide or scratch the surface. Can't wait to whip this out at my next party.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: mine had a dent in it and the handle were wobbly.. handles would broken after a few uses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking cheeseboard for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking cheeseboard for the price. Seems fragile (as slate is) and there's no foam or anything inside the box so just be careful how you store it. There are no washing instructions included but I would definitely not put it in the dishwasher or even submerge it in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

product_meta.title: Large Slate Cheese Board and Knife Set, 7 piece w/FREE 3 Ceramic Bowls, Cheese Platter Slate Board, Cheese Serving Board, 4 Stainless Steel Knives, 2 Soap Stone Chalks, 16" X 12" (7 Piece + 3)
feature_bullets: ✅ PREMIUM QUALITY SLATE CHEESE BOARD AND KNIFE SET – Beautifully hand crafted large slate cheese board and knife set, makes a perfect cheese tray for a wedding, party, or to simply share time with your loved ones or best friends. Receive complements after complements from your party guests surrounding this beautiful cheese board with knives.
✅ BONUS 3 CERAMIC BOWLS –We think what you need and add more values to this cheese board set and free of charge for you. The ceramic bowls are very handy for dipping sauce and snacks.

✅CHEESEBOARD WILL NOT CRACK – We stand behind the quality of our cheeseboard and knife set and should you ever have an issue where the slate board arrives broken, or breaks due to no fault of you own, we will replace it 100% free of charge.
✅STAINLESS STEEL CHEESE KNIVES SET WILL NOT RUST – Stainless steel cutlery set will not rust and will continue to amaze your friends and family with its rustic beauty.

✅ GREAT GIFT FOR ALL OCCASIONS – This cheese stone set is unique and impressive gift for anyone. Great gift idea for Christmas, father’s day, mother’s day and house warming parties. Click “Add to Cart” now with confidence!
